name: Planetor
description:
Planetor is a game focused on cosmos stuff and especially planets. In Planetor universe, to complete a mission you need to find all the diamonds in the galaxy while navigating around planets. Only after you reached the portal, you may explore other galaxies. Diamonds are awaiting!

KEY FEATURES
- Visually appealing 2D graphics
- Smooth handling and physics simulation
- 6 different cars and 7 different rockets to choose from
- 22 levels to complete

GAMEPLAY
- Touch the planet or any position you want the vehicle to go to
- Collect all the diamonds to open up the portal (diamond is usually on a planet)
- Collect coins and destroy the aliens!

TIPS
- UFO can be destroyed be crashing the glass
- Power up collectables that will help you along the way: speed power up, boost of jump, rockets power up, and gas canister.
- Make a flip and get an extra flip coin!

FOLLOW US
* https://www.facebook.com/PlanetorOfficial
* https://twitter.com/PCG_Planetor
